champions.name: Aatrox
champions.description: Aatrox is a fallen god-warrior who once wielded his weapon to ensure the victory of his people.

champions.name: Ahri
champions.description: Ahri is a nine-tailed fox who charms her enemies and feeds off their life essence to enhance her magic.

champions.name: Akali
champions.description: Akali is a rogue assassin who moves through the shadows, seeking vengeance against those who harm her people.

champions.name: Alistar
champions.description: Alistar is a mighty minotaur, a protector and a bastion for his allies, with tremendous strength to disrupt his enemies.

champions.name: Annie
champions.description: Annie is a young mage with powerful fire magic, able to summon her giant bear, Tibbers, to fight at her side.

champions.name: Ashe
champions.description: Ashe is an ice-wielding archer who commands her people with a steady bow and keen eye, always aiming for peace.

champions.name: Braum
champions.description: Braum is a kind-hearted protector, using his mighty shield to block damage and support his teammates.

champions.name: Caitlyn
champions.description: Caitlyn is the Sheriff of Piltover, a skilled marksman known for her impeccable aim and strategic mind.

champions.name: Darius
champions.description: Darius is the hand of Noxus, wielding a massive axe and striking fear into his enemies with raw power.

champions.name: Lux
champions.description: Lux is a radiant mage who wields light as her weapon, bringing hope and justice to those in need.

champions.name: Garen
champions.description: Garen is a noble warrior of Demacia, who stands ready to protect his people with strength and bravery.

champions.name: Jinx
champions.description: Jinx is a chaotic marksman who thrives in causing disorder, using her vast array of explosive weapons.

champions.name: Lee Sin
champions.description: Lee Sin is a blind monk who channels his inner energy to unleash powerful attacks against his foes.

champions.name: Morgana
champions.description: Morgana is a fallen angel who uses her dark magic to bind her enemies and shield her allies.

champions.name: Yasuo
champions.description: Yasuo is a master swordsman of the wind, always searching for redemption as he battles his foes.
